prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Itchy, red rash caused by contact with irritants or allergens
completion: Disease: Contact Dermatitis; Treatments: Avoiding the trigger, corticosteroid creams or ointments, antihistamines

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Sunburn-like rash, redness, itching
completion: Disease: Dermatitis due to Sun Exposure; Treatments: Moisturizers, cool compresses, topical corticosteroids

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Intense itching, visible lice or nits in the affected area
completion: Disease: Parasitic Infections; Treatments: Prescription medications (topical or oral antiparasitic agents), washing clothes and bedding in hot water

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: High fever, body aches, fatigue, cough, sore throat, congestion
completion: Disease: Influenza (Flu); Treatments: Rest, fluids, over-the-counter medications for symptom relief, antiviral medications (in some cases)

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Frequent urination, burning sensation during urination, cloudy or bloody urine, pelvic pain
completion: Disease: Urinary Tract Infection (UTI); Treatments: Antibiotics, increased fluid intake, pain relievers

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Persistent cough with yellow or green mucus, chest congestion, fatigue
completion: Disease: Bronchitis; Treatments: Rest, fluids, over-the-counter cough suppressants, inhalers (if prescribed), treating underlying cause

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, abdominal pain or cramps, fever
completion: Disease: Gastroenteritis (Stomach Flu); Treatments: Rest, fluids (electrolyte solutions), bland diet, avoiding irritating foods, over-the-counter medications for symptom relief

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Severe abdominal or back pain, blood in urine, frequent urination, pain during urination
completion: Disease: Urinary Stones (Kidney Stones); Treatments: Pain management, increased fluid intake, medications to help pass the stones, procedures or surgery

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Fragile bones, loss of height over time, back pain, fractures
completion: Disease: Osteoporosis; Treatments: Calcium and vitamin D supplements, regular exercise, medications to slow bone loss

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Joint pain, stiffness, swelling, fatigue, loss of appetite
completion: Disease: Rheumatoid Arthritis; Treatments: Medications (nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs, disease-modifying antirheumatic drugs), physical therapy, exercise

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Frequent urination, Increased thirst, Weight loss
completion: Disease: Type 1 Diabetes; Treatments: Insulin therapy, Blood sugar monitoring, Healthy eating, Regular exercise

prompt: Based on the following symptoms, predict the disease and recommend appropriate treatments. Symptoms: Fatigue, Increased hunger, Slow healing of wounds
completion: Disease: Type 2 Diabetes; Treatments: Oral medications, Insulin therapy (in some cases), Blood sugar monitoring, Exercise
